version_description:
- Fixed: cannot delete photos completely in the app;
- Fixed: wrong photo orientation after posting to Weibo (well, it's Weibo's bug actually);
- Fixed: tore image when dragging it around in the app;
- Fixed: changing system sound volume when taking a photo with volme buttons;
- Fixed: some issues related to real-time preview of Color Solutions;
- Fixed: some issues related to the horizon indicator;
- Added: some pop-up alerts about network errors;
- Fixed: some crashes on iOS 13 (probably fixed, maybe, quite possible.)

- Fixed: cannot delete photos completely in the app;
- Fixed: wrong photo orientation after posting to Weibo (well, it's Weibo's bug actually);
- Fixed: tore image when dragging it around in the app;
- Fixed: changing system sound volume when taking a photo with volme buttons;
- Fixed: some issues related to real-time preview of Color Solutions;
- Fixed: some issues related to the horizon indicator;
- Added: some pop-up alerts about network errors;
- Fixed: some crashes on iOS 13 (probably fixed, maybe, quite possible.)

New Color Solutions:
- E (M Monochrom);
- X (907X).

Bug fixes and improvements:
- Improved experience for photo processing;
- Fixed some GPS drifting issues in certain countries;
- Other optimizations.
